contents.text: If the MS is unable to terminate the join between the specified entities for any other reason, the MS reports an error (411).
contents.zh-CHS: 如果MS由于任何其他原因无法终止指定实体之间的连接，则MS报告错误（411）。

contents.text: When an MS has successfully processed a <unjoin> request, it MUST reply with a successful <response> element (Section 4.2.3).
contents.zh-CHS: 当MS成功处理<unjoin>请求时，它必须使用成功<response>元素进行回复（第4.2.3节）。

contents.text: <join>, <modifyjoin>, and <unjoin> require the identification and manipulation of media streams. Media streams represent the flow of media between a participant connection and a conference, between two connections, or between two conferences. The <stream> element is used (as a child to <join>, <modifyjoin>, and <unjoin>) to identify the media stream(s) for the request and to specify the configuration of the media stream.
contents.zh-CHS: <join>、<modifyjoin>和<unjoin>需要识别和操作媒体流。媒体流表示参与者连接和会议之间、两个连接之间或两个会议之间的媒体流。<stream>元素（作为<join>、<modifyjoin>和<unjoin>的子元素）用于标识请求的媒体流并指定媒体流的配置。

contents.text: The <stream> element has the following attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: <stream>元素具有以下属性：

contents.text: media: a string indicating the type of media associated with the stream. A valid value is a MIME type name as defined in Section 4.2 of [RFC4288]. The following values MUST be used for common types of media: "audio" for audio media, and "video" for video media. See [IANA] for registered MIME type names. The attribute is mandatory.
contents.zh-CHS: 媒体：一个字符串，指示与流关联的媒体类型。有效值是[RFC4288]第4.2节中定义的MIME类型名称。以下值必须用于常见类型的媒体：“音频”用于音频媒体，“视频”用于视频媒体。有关注册的MIME类型名称，请参见[IANA]。该属性是必需的。

contents.text: label: a string indicating the SDP label associated with a media stream [RFC4574]. The attribute is optional.
contents.zh-CHS: 标签：表示与媒体流关联的SDP标签的字符串[RFC4574]。该属性是可选的。

contents.text: direction: a string indicating the allowed media flow of the stream relative to the value of the 'id1' attribute of the parent element. Defined values are: "sendrecv" (media can be sent and received), "sendonly" (media can only be sent), "recvonly" (media can only be received), and "inactive" (stream established but no media flow). The default value is "sendrecv". The attribute is optional.
contents.zh-CHS: 方向：一个字符串，指示相对于父元素的“id1”属性值允许的流媒体流。定义的值为：“sendrecv”（可以发送和接收媒体）、“sendonly”（只能发送媒体）、“RecVoOnly”（只能接收媒体）和“inactive”（已建立流但没有媒体流）。默认值为“sendrecv”。该属性是可选的。

contents.text: The <stream> element has the following sequence of child elements:
contents.zh-CHS: <stream>元素具有以下子元素序列：

contents.text: <volume>: an element (Section 4.2.2.5.1) to configure the volume or gain of the media stream. The element is optional.
contents.zh-CHS: <volume>：配置媒体流的音量或增益的元素（第4.2.2.5.1节）。元素是可选的。

contents.text: <clamp>: an element (Section 4.2.2.5.2) to configure filtering and removal of tones from the media stream. The element is optional.
contents.zh-CHS: <clamp>：一个元素（第4.2.2.5.2节），用于配置过滤和删除媒体流中的音调。元素是可选的。

contents.text: <region>: an element (Section 4.2.2.5.3) to configure a region within a video layout where the media stream is displayed. The element is optional.
contents.zh-CHS: <region>：用于在视频布局中配置显示媒体流的区域的元素（第4.2.2.5.3节）。元素是可选的。

contents.text: <priority>: an element (Section 4.2.2.5.4) to configure priority associated with the stream in the media mix. The element is optional.
contents.zh-CHS: <priority>：用于配置与媒体混合中的流关联的优先级的元素（第4.2.2.5.4节）。元素是可选的。

contents.text: In each child element, the media stream affected is indicated by the value of the 'direction' attribute of the parent element.
contents.zh-CHS: 在每个子元素中，受影响的媒体流由父元素的“direction”属性的值指示。

contents.text: If the 'media' attribute does not have the value of "audio", then the MS ignores <volume> and <clamp> elements.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果“媒体”属性没有“音频”的值，则MS将忽略<volume>和<clamp>元素。

contents.text: If the 'media' attribute does not have the value of "video", then the MS ignores a <region> element.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果“媒体”属性没有“视频”的值，则MS将忽略<region>元素。

contents.text: For example, a request to join a connection to conference in both directions with volume control is as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 例如，使用音量控制在两个方向加入到会议的连接的请求如下所示：

contents.text:
<mscmixer version="1.0" xmlns="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:msc-mixer">
 <join id1="1536067209:913cd14c" id2="conference1">
  <stream media="audio" direction="sendrecv">
   <volume controltype="setgain" value="-3"/>
  </stream>
 </join>
</mscmixer>
where audio flow from the connection (id1) to the conference (id2) has the volume lowered by 3 dB, and likewise the volume of the audio flow from the conference to the connection is lowered by 3 dB.
contents.zh-CHS: 其中，从连接（id1）到会议（id2）的音频流的音量降低了3 dB，同样，从会议到连接的音频流的音量也降低了3 dB。

contents.text: In this example, the volume is independently controlled for each direction.
contents.zh-CHS: 在此示例中，每个方向的音量都是独立控制的。

contents.text:
<mscmixer version="1.0" xmlns="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:msc-mixer">
 <join id1="1536067209:913cd14c" id2="conference1">
  <stream media="audio" direction="sendonly">
   <volume controltype="setgain" value="-3"/>
  </stream>
  <stream media="audio" direction="recvonly">
   <volume controltype="setgain" value="+3"/>
  </stream>
 </join>
</mscmixer>
where audio flow from the connection (id1) to the conference (id2) has the volume lowered by 3 dB, but the volume of the audio flow from the conference to the connection is raised by 3 dB.
contents.zh-CHS: 其中，从连接（id1）到会议（id2）的音频流的音量降低了3 dB，但从会议到连接的音频流的音量提高了3 dB。

contents.text: The <volume> element is used to configure the volume of an audio media stream. It can be set to a specific gain amount, to automatically adjust the gain to a desired target level, or to mute the volume.
contents.zh-CHS: <volume>元素用于配置音频媒体流的音量。它可以设置为特定的增益量，以自动将增益调整到所需的目标水平，或使音量静音。

contents.text: The <volume> element has no child elements but has the following attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: <volume>元素没有子元素，但具有以下属性：

contents.text: controltype: a string indicating the type of volume control to use for the stream. Defined values are: "automatic" (the volume will be adjusted automatically to the level specified by the 'value' attribute), "setgain" (use the value of the 'value' attribute as a specific gain measured in dB to apply), and "setstate" (set the state of the stream to "mute" or "unmute" as specified by the value of the 'value' attribute). The attribute is mandatory.
contents.zh-CHS: controltype：一个字符串，指示要用于流的卷控制类型。定义的值为：“自动”（音量将自动调整到“值”属性指定的级别）、“设置增益”（将“值”属性的值用作以dB为单位测量的特定增益）和“设置状态”（将流的状态设置为“静音”或“取消静音”，如“值”属性的值所指定）。该属性是必需的。

contents.text: value: a string specifying the amount or state for the volume control defined by the value of the 'controltype' attribute. The attribute is optional. There is no default value.
contents.zh-CHS: 值：一个字符串，指定由“controltype”属性的值定义的音量控制的量或状态。该属性是可选的。没有默认值。

contents.text: If the audio media stream is in a muted state, then the MS also changes automatically the state to unmuted with an "automatic" or "setgain" volume control. For example, assume an audio stream has been muted with <volume controltype="setstate" value="mute"/>. If the gain on the same stream is changed with <volume controltype="setgain" value="+3"/>, then the volume is increased and stream state is also changed to unmuted.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果音频媒体流处于静音状态，则MS也会通过“自动”或“设置增益”音量控制自动将状态更改为未静音。例如，假设音频流已使用<volume controltype=“setstate”value=“mute”/。如果使用<volume controltype=“setgain”value=“+3”/>更改同一流上的增益，则音量将增加，流状态也将更改为未静音。

contents.text: The <clamp> element is used to configure whether tones are filtered and removed from a media stream.
contents.zh-CHS: 元素用于配置是否从媒体流中过滤和删除音调。

contents.text: The <clamp> element has no child elements but has the following attribute:
contents.zh-CHS: <clamp>元素没有子元素，但具有以下属性：

contents.text: tones: A space-separated list of the tones to remove. The attribute is optional. The default value is "1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 0 * # A B C D" (i.e., all DTMF (Dual-Tone Multi-Frequency) tones are removed).
contents.zh-CHS: 音调：以空格分隔的要删除的音调列表。该属性是可选的。默认值为“1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 0*#A B C D”（即，删除所有DTMF（双音多频）音）。

contents.text: As described in Section 4.2.1.4.2.1, each <video-layout> is composed of one or more named regions (or areas) in which video media can be presented. For example, the XCON layout <dual-view> has two regions named "1" and "2", respectively.
contents.zh-CHS: 如第4.2.1.4.2.1节所述，每个<video layout>由一个或多个可显示视频媒体的命名区域（或区域）组成。例如，XCON布局<dual view>有两个区域，分别命名为“1”和“2”。

contents.text: The <region> element is used to explicitly specify the name of the area within a video layout where a video media stream is displayed.
contents.zh-CHS: <region>元素用于明确指定视频布局中显示视频媒体流的区域的名称。

contents.text: The <region> element has no attributes, and its content model specifies the name of the region.
contents.zh-CHS: <region>元素没有属性，其内容模型指定区域的名称。

contents.text: 4.2.2.5.4. <priority>
contents.zh-CHS: 4.2.2.5.4. <priority>

contents.text: The <priority> element is used to explicitly specify the priority of a participant. The MS uses this priority to determine where the media stream is displayed within a video layout (Section 4.2.1.4.3.1).
contents.zh-CHS: 元素用于显式指定参与者的优先级。MS使用此优先级确定媒体流在视频布局中的显示位置（第4.2.1.4.3.1节）。

contents.text: The <priority> element has no attributes, and its content model specifies a positive integer (see Section 4.7.3). The lower the value, the higher the priority.
contents.zh-CHS: <priority>元素没有属性，其内容模型指定了一个正整数（参见第4.7.3节）。值越低，优先级越高。

contents.text: 4.2.3. <response>
contents.zh-CHS: 4.2.3. <response>

contents.text: Responses to requests are indicated by a <response> element.
contents.zh-CHS: 对请求的响应由<response>元素表示。

contents.text: The <response> element has following attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: <response>元素具有以下属性：

contents.text: status: numeric code indicating the response status. Valid values are defined in Section 4.6. The attribute is mandatory.
contents.zh-CHS: 状态：表示响应状态的数字代码。第4.6节定义了有效值。该属性是必需的。

contents.text: reason: string specifying a reason for the response status. The attribute is optional.
contents.zh-CHS: 原因：指定响应状态原因的字符串。该属性是可选的。

contents.text: desclang: specifies the language used in the value of the 'reason' attribute. A valid value is a language identifier (Section 4.7.7). The attribute is optional. If not specified, the value of the 'desclang' attribute on <mscmixer> (Section 4.1) applies.
contents.zh-CHS: desclang：指定“原因”属性值中使用的语言。有效值是语言标识符（第4.7.7节）。该属性是可选的。如果未指定，则<mscmixer>（第4.1节）上的“desclang”属性值适用。

contents.text: conferenceid: string identifying the conference (see Appendix A.1 of [RFC6230]). The attribute is optional.
contents.zh-CHS: conferenceid：标识会议的字符串（见[RFC6230]的附录A.1）。该属性是可选的。

contents.text: connectionid: string identifying the SIP dialog connection (see Appendix A.1 of [RFC6230]). The attribute is optional.
contents.zh-CHS: connectionid：标识SIP对话连接的字符串（参见[RFC6230]的附录A.1）。该属性是可选的。

contents.text: For example, a response when a conference was created successfully is as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 例如，成功创建会议时的响应如下所示：

contents.text: <response code="200"/>
If conference creation failed due to the requested conference ID already existing, the response is:
contents.zh-CHS: 如果由于请求的会议ID已存在而导致会议创建失败，则响应为：

contents.text: <response code="405" reason="Conference already exists"/>
When a mixer generates a notification event, the MS sends the event using an <event> element.
contents.zh-CHS: 当混合器生成通知事件时，MS使用<event>元素发送事件。

contents.text: The <event> element has no attributes, but has the following sequence of child elements (zero or more instances of each child):
contents.zh-CHS: <event>元素没有属性，但具有以下子元素序列（每个子元素的零个或多个实例）：

contents.text: <active-talkers-notify>: specifies an active talkers notification (Section 4.2.4.1).
contents.zh-CHS: <active talkers notify>：指定active talkers通知（第4.2.4.1节）。

contents.text: <unjoin-notify>: notifies that a connection or conference has been completely unjoined (Section 4.2.4.2).
contents.zh-CHS: <取消连接通知>：通知连接或会议已完全取消连接（第4.2.4.2节）。

contents.text: <conferenceexit>: notifies that a conference has exited (Section 4.2.4.3).
contents.zh-CHS: <conferenceexit>：通知会议已退出（第4.2.4.3节）。

contents.text: 4.2.4.1. <active-talkers-notify>
contents.zh-CHS: 4.2.4.1. <active talkers notify>

contents.text: The <active-talkers-notify> element describes zero or more speakers that have been active in a conference during the specified interval (see Section 4.2.1.4.4.1).
contents.zh-CHS: <active talkers notify>元素描述了在指定间隔期间在会议中处于活动状态的零个或多个扬声器（参见第4.2.1.4.4.1节）。

contents.text: The <active-talkers-notify> element has the following attribute:
contents.zh-CHS: <active talkers notify>元素具有以下属性：

contents.text: conferenceid: string indicating the name of the conference from which the event originated. This attribute is mandatory.
contents.zh-CHS: conferenceid：表示事件起源的会议名称的字符串。此属性是必需的。

contents.text: The <active-talkers-notify> element has the following sequence of child elements (zero or more occurrences):
contents.zh-CHS: <active talkers notify>元素具有以下子元素序列（零次或多次出现）：

contents.text: <active-talker>: element describing an active talker (Section 4.2.4.1.1).
contents.zh-CHS: <active talker>：描述活跃谈话者的元素（第4.2.4.1.1节）。

contents.text: 4.2.4.1.1. <active-talker>
contents.zh-CHS: 4.2.4.1.1. <active talker>

contents.text: The <active-talker> element describes an active talker, associated with either a connection or conference participant in a conference.
contents.zh-CHS: <active talker>元素描述与会议中的连接或会议参与者相关联的活动说话者。

contents.text: The <active-talker> element has the following attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: <active talker>元素具有以下属性：

contents.text: connectionid: string indicating the connectionid of the active talker. This attribute is optional. There is no default value.
contents.zh-CHS: connectionid：表示活动说话者的connectionid的字符串。此属性是可选的。没有默认值。

contents.text: conferenceid: string indicating the conferenceid of the active talker. This attribute is optional. There is no default value.
contents.zh-CHS: conferenceid：表示活动说话者的conferenceid的字符串。此属性是可选的。没有默认值。

contents.text: Note that the element does not describe an active talker if both the 'connectionid' and 'conferenceid' attributes are specified, or if neither attribute is specified.
contents.zh-CHS: 请注意，如果同时指定了“connectionid”和“conferenceid”属性，或者两个属性都未指定，则元素不会描述活动说话者。

contents.text: The <active-talker> element has no child elements.
contents.zh-CHS: <active talker>元素没有子元素。

contents.text: 4.2.4.2. <unjoin-notify>
contents.zh-CHS: 4.2.4.2. <unjoin notify>

contents.text: The <unjoin-notify> element describes a notification event where a connection and/or conference have been completely unjoined.
contents.zh-CHS: <unjoin notify>元素描述连接和/或会议完全取消连接的通知事件。

contents.text: The <unjoin-notify> element has the following attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: <unjoin notify>元素具有以下属性：

contents.text: status: a status code indicating why the unjoin occurred. A valid value is a non-negative integer (see Section 4.7.2). The MS MUST support the following values:
contents.zh-CHS: 状态：指示取消连接原因的状态代码。有效值为非负整数（见第4.7.2节）。MS必须支持以下值：

contents.text: 0 indicates the join has been terminated by a <unjoin> request.
contents.zh-CHS: 0表示加入已被<unjoin>请求终止。

contents.text: 1 indicates the join terminated due to an execution error.
contents.zh-CHS: 1表示由于执行错误而终止的联接。

contents.text: 2 indicates that the join terminated because a connection or conference has terminated.
contents.zh-CHS: 2表示连接已终止，因为连接或会议已终止。

contents.text: All other valid but undefined values are reserved for future use, where new status codes are assigned using the Standards Action process defined in [RFC5226]. The AS MUST treat any status code it does not recognize as being equivalent to 1 (join execution error). The attribute is mandatory.
contents.zh-CHS: 所有其他有效但未定义的值保留供将来使用，其中新的状态代码使用[RFC5226]中定义的标准操作流程分配。AS必须将其无法识别的任何状态代码视为等同于1（联接执行错误）。该属性是必需的。

contents.text: reason: a textual description providing a reason for the status code, e.g., details about an error. A valid value is a string (see Section 4.7.4). The attribute is optional. There is no default value.
contents.zh-CHS: 原因：提供状态代码原因的文本描述，例如，有关错误的详细信息。有效值为字符串（见第4.7.4节）。该属性是可选的。没有默认值。

contents.text: desclang: specifies the language used in the value of the 'reason' attribute. A valid value is a language identifier (Section 4.7.7). The attribute is optional. If not specified, the value of the 'desclang' attribute on <mscmixer> (Section 4.1) applies.
contents.zh-CHS: desclang：指定“原因”属性值中使用的语言。有效值是语言标识符（第4.7.7节）。该属性是可选的。如果未指定，则<mscmixer>（第4.1节）上的“desclang”属性值适用。

contents.text: id1: an identifier for either a connection or a conference. The identifier MUST conform to the syntax defined in Appendix A.1 of [RFC6230]. The attribute is mandatory.
contents.zh-CHS: id1：连接或会议的标识符。标识符必须符合[RFC6230]附录A.1中定义的语法。该属性是必需的。

contents.text: id2: an identifier for either a connection or a conference. The identifier MUST conform to the syntax defined in Appendix A.1 of [RFC6230]. The attribute is mandatory.
contents.zh-CHS: id2：连接或会议的标识符。标识符必须符合[RFC6230]附录A.1中定义的语法。该属性是必需的。

contents.text: The <unjoin-notify> element has no child elements.
contents.zh-CHS: <unjoin notify>元素没有子元素。

contents.text: 4.2.4.3. <conferenceexit>
contents.zh-CHS: 4.2.4.3. <conferenceexit>

contents.text: The <conferenceexit> element indicates that a conference has exited because it has been terminated or because a error occurred (for example, a hardware error in the conference mixing unit). This event MUST be sent by the MS whenever a successfully created conference exits.
contents.zh-CHS: <conferenceexit>元素表示会议已退出，因为会议已终止或发生错误（例如，会议混合单元中的硬件错误）。每当成功创建的会议退出时，MS必须发送此事件。

contents.text: The <conferenceexit> element has the following attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: <conferenceexit>元素具有以下属性：

contents.text: conferenceid: string indicating the name of the conference. This attribute is mandatory.
contents.zh-CHS: conferenceid：表示会议名称的字符串。此属性是必需的。

contents.text: status: a status code indicating why the conference exited. A valid value is a non-negative integer (see Section 4.7.2). The MS MUST support the following values:
contents.zh-CHS: 状态：指示会议退出原因的状态代码。有效值为非负整数（见第4.7.2节）。MS必须支持以下值：

contents.text: 0 indicates the conference has been terminated by a <destroyconference> request.
contents.zh-CHS: 0表示会议已被<destroyconference>请求终止。

contents.text: 1 indicates the conference terminated due to an execution error.
contents.zh-CHS: 1表示会议因执行错误而终止。

contents.text: 2 indicates the conference terminated due to exceeding the maximum duration for a conference.
contents.zh-CHS: 2表示会议因超过会议的最长持续时间而终止。

contents.text: All other valid but undefined values are reserved for future use, where new status codes are assigned using the Standards Action process defined in [RFC5226]. The AS MUST treat any status code it does not recognize as being equivalent to 1 (conference execution error). The attribute is mandatory.
contents.zh-CHS: 所有其他有效但未定义的值保留供将来使用，其中新的状态代码使用[RFC5226]中定义的标准操作流程分配。AS必须将其无法识别的任何状态代码视为等同于1（会议执行错误）。该属性是必需的。

contents.text: reason: a textual description providing a reason for the status code, e.g., details about an error. A valid value is a string (see Section 4.7.4). The attribute is optional. There is no default value.
contents.zh-CHS: 原因：提供状态代码原因的文本描述，例如，有关错误的详细信息。有效值为字符串（见第4.7.4节）。该属性是可选的。没有默认值。

contents.text: desclang: specifies the language used in the value of the 'reason' attribute. A valid value is a language identifier (Section 4.7.7). The attribute is optional. If not specified, the value of the 'desclang' attribute on <mscmixer> (Section 4.1) applies.
contents.zh-CHS: desclang：指定“原因”属性值中使用的语言。有效值是语言标识符（第4.7.7节）。该属性是可选的。如果未指定，则<mscmixer>（第4.1节）上的“desclang”属性值适用。

contents.text: The <conferenceexit> element has no child elements.
contents.zh-CHS: <conferenceexit>元素没有子元素。

contents.text: When a MS sends a <conferenceexit> event, the identifier for the conference ('conferenceid' attribute) is no longer valid on the MS and can be reused for another conference.
contents.zh-CHS: 当MS发送<conferenceexit>事件时，会议的标识符（'conferenceid'属性）在MS上不再有效，可以重新用于另一个会议。

contents.text: For example, the following notification event would be sent from the MS when the conference with identifier "conference99" exits due to a successful <destroyconference/>:
contents.zh-CHS: 例如，当标识符为“conference99”的会议由于成功的<destroyconference/>而退出时，MS将发送以下通知事件：

contents.text:
<mscmixer version="1.0" xmlns="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:msc-mixer">
 <event>
  <conferenceexit conferenceid="conference99"
     status="0"/>
 </event>
</mscmixer>
4.3. Audit Elements
contents.zh-CHS: 4.3. 审计要素

contents.text: The audit elements defined in this section allow the MS to be audited for package capabilities as well as mixers managed by the package. Auditing is particularly important for two use cases. First, it enables discovery of package capabilities supported on an MS before an AS creates a conference mixer or joins connections and conferences. The AS can then use this information to create request elements using supported capabilities and, in the case of codecs, to negotiate an appropriate SDP for a user agent's connection. Second, auditing enables discovery of the existence and status of mixers
contents.zh-CHS: 本节中定义的审核元素允许对MS的包功能以及由包管理的混音器进行审核。审计对于两个用例尤其重要。首先，它支持在AS创建会议混音器或加入连接和会议之前发现MS上支持的包功能。AS然后可以使用此信息使用支持的功能创建请求元素，对于编解码器，还可以协商用户代理连接的适当SDP。其次，审计能够发现混音器的存在和状态

contents.text: currently managed by the package on the MS. This could be used when one AS takes over management of mixers if the AS that created the mixers fails or is no longer available (see the security considerations in Section 7).
contents.zh-CHS: 目前由MS上的软件包管理。如果创建混音器的AS出现故障或不再可用（请参阅第7节中的安全注意事项），当AS接管混音器的管理时，可以使用此选项。

contents.text: The <audit> request element is sent to the MS to request information about the capabilities of, and mixers currently managed with, this Control Package. Capabilities include supported conference codecs and video layouts. Mixer information includes the status of managed mixers as well as codecs.
contents.zh-CHS: <audit>请求元素被发送到MS，以请求有关此控制包的功能和当前使用此控制包管理的混音器的信息。功能包括受支持的会议编解码器和视频布局。混音器信息包括受管混音器和编解码器的状态。

contents.text: The <audit> element has the following attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: <audit>元素具有以下属性：

contents.text: capabilities: indicates whether package capabilities are to be audited. A valid value is a boolean (see Section 4.7.1). A value of "true" indicates that capability information is to be reported. A value of "false" indicates that capability information is not to be reported. The attribute is optional. The default value is "true".
contents.zh-CHS: 能力：指示是否要审核包能力。有效值为布尔值（见第4.7.1节）。值“true”表示要报告能力信息。值“false”表示不报告能力信息。该属性是可选的。默认值为“true”。

contents.text: mixers: indicates whether mixers currently managed by the package are to be audited. A valid value is a boolean (see Section 4.7.1). A value of "true" indicates that mixer information is to be reported. A value of "false" indicates that mixer information is not to be reported. The attribute is optional. The default value is "true".
contents.zh-CHS: 混音器：指示是否要审核当前由包管理的混音器。有效值为布尔值（见第4.7.1节）。值“true”表示要报告混音器信息。值“false”表示不报告混音器信息。该属性是可选的。默认值为“true”。

contents.text: conferenceid: string identifying a specific conference mixer to audit. It is an error (406) if the 'conferenceid' attribute is specified and the conference identifier is not valid. The attribute is optional. There is no default value.
contents.zh-CHS: conferenceid：标识要审核的特定会议混合器的字符串。如果指定了'conferenceid'属性且会议标识符无效，则为错误（406）。该属性是可选的。没有默认值。

contents.text: If the 'mixers' attribute has the value "true" and 'conferenceid' attribute is specified, then only audit information about the specified conference mixer is reported. If the 'mixers' attribute has the value "false", then no mixer audit information is reported even if a 'conferenceid' attribute is specified.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果“混合器”属性的值为“true”，并且指定了“conferenceid”属性，则只报告有关指定会议混合器的审核信息。如果“混合器”属性的值为“false”，则即使指定了“conferenceid”属性，也不会报告混合器审核信息。

contents.text: The <audit> element has no child elements.
contents.zh-CHS: <audit>元素没有子元素。

contents.text:
When the MS receives an <audit> request, it MUST reply with a
<auditresponse> element (Section 4.3.2) that includes a mandatory
attribute describing the status in terms of a numeric code.  Response
status codes are defined in Section 4.6.  If the request is
successful, the <auditresponse> contains (depending on attribute
values) a <capabilities> element (Section 4.3.2.1) reporting package

capabilities and a <mixers> element (Section 4.3.2.2) reporting managed mixer information. If the MS is not able to process the request and carry out the audit operation, the audit request has failed and the MS MUST indicate the class of failure using an appropriate 4xx response code. Unless an error response code is specified for a class of error within this section, implementations follow Section 4.6 in determining the appropriate status code for the response.
contents.zh-CHS: 功能和报告托管混音器信息的<mixers>元素（第4.3.2.2节）。如果MS无法处理请求并执行审核操作，则审核请求失败，MS必须使用适当的4xx响应代码指示故障类别。除非在本节中为某类错误指定了错误响应代码，否则在确定响应的适当状态代码时，应遵循第4.6节的规定。

contents.text: For example, a request to audit capabilities and mixers managed by the package is as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 例如，对包管理的功能和混音器进行审核的请求如下：

contents.text:
<mscmixer version="1.0" xmlns="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:msc-mixer">
  <audit/>
</mscmixer>
In this example, only capabilities are to be audited:
contents.zh-CHS: 在本例中，仅审核功能：

contents.text:
<mscmixer version="1.0" xmlns="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:msc-mixer">
  <audit mixers="false"/>
</mscmixer>
With this example, only a specific conference mixer is to be audited:
contents.zh-CHS: 在本例中，仅审核特定的会议混音器：

contents.text:
<mscmixer version="1.0" xmlns="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:msc-mixer">
  <audit capabilities="false" conferenceid="conf4"/>
</mscmixer>
4.3.2. <auditresponse>
contents.zh-CHS: 4.3.2. <auditresponse>

contents.text: The <auditresponse> element describes a response to a <audit> request.
contents.zh-CHS: 元素描述对<audit>请求的响应。

contents.text: The <auditresponse> element has the following attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: <auditresponse>元素具有以下属性：

contents.text: status: numeric code indicating the audit response status. The attribute is mandatory. Valid values are defined in Section 4.6.
contents.zh-CHS: 状态：表示审核响应状态的数字代码。该属性是必需的。第4.6节定义了有效值。

contents.text: reason: string specifying a reason for the status. The attribute is optional.
contents.zh-CHS: 原因：指定状态原因的字符串。该属性是可选的。

contents.text: desclang: specifies the language used in the value of the 'reason' attribute. A valid value is a language identifier (Section 4.7.7). The attribute is optional. If not specified, the value of the 'desclang' attribute on <mscmixer> (Section 4.1) applies.
contents.zh-CHS: desclang：指定“原因”属性值中使用的语言。有效值是语言标识符（第4.7.7节）。该属性是可选的。如果未指定，则<mscmixer>（第4.1节）上的“desclang”属性值适用。

contents.text: The <auditresponse> element has the following sequence of child elements:
contents.zh-CHS: <auditresponse>元素具有以下子元素序列：

contents.text: <capabilities>: element describing capabilities of the package (see Section 4.3.2.1). The element is optional.
contents.zh-CHS: <capabilities>：描述软件包功能的元素（见第4.3.2.1节）。元素是可选的。

contents.text: <mixers>: element describing information about managed mixers (see Section 4.3.2.2). The element is optional.
contents.zh-CHS: <mixers>：描述托管混频器信息的元素（见第4.3.2.2节）。元素是可选的。

contents.text: For example, a successful response to an <audit> request for capabilities and mixer information is as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 例如，对功能和混音器信息的<audit>请求的成功响应如下：

contents.text:
<mscmixer version="1.0" xmlns="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:msc-mixer">
 <auditresponse status="200">
  <capabilities>
   <codecs>
    <codec name="video">
     <subtype>H263</subtype>
    </codec>
    <codec name="video">
     <subtype>H264</subtype>
    </codec>
    <codec name="audio">
     <subtype>PCMU</subtype>
    </codec>
    <codec name="audio">
     <subtype>PCMA</subtype>
    </codec>
   </codecs>
  </capabilities>
  <mixers>
   <conferenceaudit conferenceid="conf1">
    <codecs>
     <codec name="audio">
      <subtype>PCMA</subtype>
     </codec>
    </codecs>
    <participants>
     <participant id="1536067209:913cd14c"/>
    </participants>
   </conferenceaudit>
   <joinaudit id1="1536067209:913cd14c" id2="conf1"/>
   <joinaudit id1="1636067209:113cd14c" id2="1836067209:313cd14c"/>
   <joinaudit id1="1736067209:213cd14c" id2="1936067209:413cd14c"/>
  </mixers>
 </auditresponse>
</mscmixer>
4.3.2.1. <capabilities>
contents.zh-CHS: 4.3.2.1. <capabilities>

contents.text: The <capabilities> element provides audit information about package capabilities.
contents.zh-CHS: <capabilities>元素提供有关包功能的审核信息。

contents.text: The <capabilities> element has no attributes.
contents.zh-CHS: <capabilities>元素没有属性。

contents.text: The <capabilities> element has the following sequence of child elements:
contents.zh-CHS: <capabilities>元素具有以下子元素序列：

contents.text: <codecs>: element (Section 4.4) describing codecs available to the package. The element is mandatory.
contents.zh-CHS: <codecs>：描述软件包可用编解码器的元素（第4.4节）。该元素是必需的。

contents.text: For example, a fragment describing capabilities is as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 例如，描述功能的片段如下所示：

contents.text:
<capabilities>
 <codecs>
  <codec name="video">
   <subtype>H263</subtype>
  </codec>
  <codec name="video">
   <subtype>H264</subtype>
  </codec>
  <codec name="audio">
   <subtype>PCMU</subtype>
  </codec>
  <codec name="audio">
   <subtype>PCMA</subtype>
  </codec>
 </codecs>
</capabilities>
The <mixers> element provides audit information about mixers.
contents.zh-CHS: <mixers>元素提供有关mixer的审计信息。

contents.text: The <mixers> element has no attributes.
contents.zh-CHS: <mixers>元素没有属性。

contents.text: The <mixers> element has the following sequence of child elements (zero or more occurrences, any order):
contents.zh-CHS: <mixers>元素具有以下子元素序列（零次或多次出现，任意顺序）：

contents.text: <conferenceaudit>: audit information for a conference mixer (Section 4.3.2.2.1). The element is optional.
contents.zh-CHS: <conferenceaudit>：会议混音器的审核信息（第4.3.2.2.1节）。元素是可选的。

contents.text: <joinaudit>: audit information for a join mixer (Section 4.3.2.2.2). The element is optional.
contents.zh-CHS: <joinaudit>：联接混合器的审计信息（第4.3.2.2.2节）。元素是可选的。

contents.text: 4.3.2.2.1. <conferenceaudit>
contents.zh-CHS: 4.3.2.2.1. <conferenceaudit>

contents.text: The <conferenceaudit> element has the following attribute:
contents.zh-CHS: <conferenceaudit>元素具有以下属性：

contents.text: conferenceid: string identifying the conference (see Appendix A.1 of [RFC6230]). The attribute is mandatory.
contents.zh-CHS: conferenceid：标识会议的字符串（见[RFC6230]的附录A.1）。该属性是必需的。

contents.text: The <conferenceaudit> element has the following sequence of child elements:
contents.zh-CHS: <conferenceaudit>元素具有以下子元素序列：

contents.text: <codecs> element describing codecs used in the conference. See Section 4.4. The element is optional.
contents.zh-CHS: 描述会议中使用的编解码器的元素。见第4.4节。元素是可选的。

contents.text: <participants> element listing connections or conferences joined to the conference. See Section 4.3.2.2.1.1. The element is optional.
contents.zh-CHS: <参与者>元素，列出加入会议的连接或会议。见第4.3.2.2.1.1节。元素是可选的。

contents.text: <video-layout> element describing the active video layout for the conference. See Section 4.2.1.4.2.1. The element is optional.
contents.zh-CHS: <video layout>描述会议活动视频布局的元素。见第4.2.1.4.2.1节。元素是可选的。

contents.text: For example, a fragment describing a conference that has been created but has no participants is as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 例如，描述已创建但没有参与者的会议的片段如下：

contents.text: <conferenceaudit conferenceid="conference1"/>
A fragment when the same conference has three participants (two connections and another conference) joined to it is as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 当同一会议有三名参与者（两个连接和另一个会议）加入时，其片段如下：

contents.text:
<conferenceaudit conferenceid="conference1">
 <codecs>
  <codec name="audio">
   <subtype>PCMU</subtype>
  </codec>
 </codecs>
 <participants>
   <participant id="connection1"/>
   <participant id="connection2"/>
   <participant id="conference2"/>
 </participants>
</conferenceaudit>
4.3.2.2.1.1. <participants>
The <participants> element is a container for <participant> elements (Section 4.3.2.2.1.1.1).
contents.zh-CHS: <participants>元素是<participant>元素的容器（第4.3.2.2.1.1节）。

contents.text: The <participants> element has no attributes, but the following child elements are defined (zero or more):
contents.zh-CHS: <participants>元素没有属性，但定义了以下子元素（零个或多个）：

contents.text: <participant>: specifies a participant (Section 4.3.2.2.1.1.1).
contents.zh-CHS: <participant>：指定参与者（第4.3.2.2.1.1.1节）。

contents.text: 4.3.2.2.1.1.1. <participant>
contents.zh-CHS: 4.3.2.2.1.1.1. <participant>

contents.text: The <participant> element describes a participant.
contents.zh-CHS: <participant>元素描述参与者。

contents.text: The <participant> element has the following attribute:
contents.zh-CHS: <participant>元素具有以下属性：

contents.text: id: an identifier for either a connection or a conference. The identifier MUST conform to the syntax defined in Appendix A.1 of [RFC6230]. The attribute is mandatory.
contents.zh-CHS: id：连接或会议的标识符。标识符必须符合[RFC6230]附录A.1中定义的语法。该属性是必需的。

contents.text: The <participant> element has no children.
contents.zh-CHS: <participant>元素没有子元素。

contents.text: 4.3.2.2.2. <joinaudit>
contents.zh-CHS: 4.3.2.2.2. <joinaudit>

contents.text: The <joinaudit> element has the following attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: <joinaudit>元素具有以下属性：

contents.text: id1: an identifier for either a connection or a conference. The identifier MUST conform to the syntax defined in Appendix A.1 of [RFC6230]. The attribute is mandatory.
contents.zh-CHS: id1：连接或会议的标识符。标识符必须符合[RFC6230]附录A.1中定义的语法。该属性是必需的。

contents.text: id2: an identifier for either a connection or a conference. The identifier MUST conform to the syntax defined in Appendix A.1 of [RFC6230]. The attribute is mandatory.
contents.zh-CHS: id2：连接或会议的标识符。标识符必须符合[RFC6230]附录A.1中定义的语法。该属性是必需的。

contents.text: The <joinaudit> element has no children.
contents.zh-CHS: <joinaudit>元素没有子元素。

contents.text: For example, a fragment describing an audit of two join mixers, one between connections and the second between conferences, is as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 例如，描述两个连接混合器（一个在连接之间，另一个在会议之间）审计的片段如下：

contents.text:
<mixers>
 <joinaudit id1="1536067209:913cd14" id2="1636067209:413cd14"/>
 <joinaudit id1="conference1" id2="conference2"/>
</mixers>
4.4. <codecs>
contents.zh-CHS: 4.4. <编解码器>

contents.text: The <codecs> element is a container for one or more codec definitions. Codec definitions are used by an AS to specify the codecs allowed for a conference (e.g., when used as a child of <createconference> or <modifyconference). Codec definitions are used by an MS to provide audit information about the codecs supported by an MS and used in specific conferences.
contents.zh-CHS: 元素是一个或多个编解码器定义的容器。编解码器定义由AS用于指定会议所允许的编解码器（例如，当用作<createconference>或<modifyconference>的子级时）。编解码器定义由MS用于提供有关MS支持并在特定会议中使用的编解码器的审核信息。

contents.text: The <codecs> element has no attributes.
contents.zh-CHS: <codecs>元素没有属性。

contents.text: The <codecs> element has the following sequence of child elements (zero or more occurrences):
contents.zh-CHS: <codecs>元素具有以下子元素序列（零次或多次出现）：

contents.text: <codec>: defines a codec and optionally its policy (Section 4.4.1). The element is optional.
contents.zh-CHS: <codec>：定义编解码器及其策略（可选）（第4.4.1节）。元素是可选的。

contents.text: For example, a fragment describing two codecs is as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 例如，描述两个编解码器的片段如下所示：

contents.text:
<codecs>
  <codec name="audio">
   <subtype>PCMA</subtype>
  </codec>
  <codec name="video">
    <subtype>H263</subtype>
  </codec>
</codecs>

The <codec> element describes a codec. The element is modeled on the <codec> element in the XCON conference information data model ([RFC6501]) and allows additional information (e.g., rate, speed, etc.) to be specified.
contents.zh-CHS: <codec>元素描述编解码器。该元素基于XCON会议信息数据模型（[RFC6501]）中的<codec>元素建模，并允许指定附加信息（例如速率、速度等）。

contents.text: The <codec> element has the following attribute:
contents.zh-CHS: <codec>元素具有以下属性：

contents.text: name: indicates the type name of the codec's media format as defined in [IANA]. A valid value is a "type-name" as defined in Section 4.2 of [RFC4288]. The attribute is mandatory.
contents.zh-CHS: 名称：表示[IANA]中定义的编解码器媒体格式的类型名称。有效值为[RFC4288]第4.2节中定义的“类型名称”。该属性是必需的。

contents.text: The <codec> element has the following sequence of child elements:
contents.zh-CHS: <codec>元素具有以下子元素序列：

contents.text: <subtype>: element whose content model describes the subtype of the codec's media format as defined in [IANA]. A valid value is a "subtype-name" as defined in Section 4.2 of [RFC4288]. The element is mandatory.
contents.zh-CHS: <subtype>：元素，其内容模型描述[IANA]中定义的编解码器媒体格式的子类型。有效值为[RFC4288]第4.2节中定义的“子类型名称”。该元素是必需的。

contents.text: <params>: element (Section 4.5) describing additional information about the codec. This package is agnostic to the names and values of the codec parameters supported by an implementation. The element is optional.
contents.zh-CHS: <params>：描述编解码器附加信息的元素（第4.5节）。此包与实现支持的编解码器参数的名称和值无关。元素是可选的。

contents.text: For example, a fragment with a <codec> element describing the H263 codec is as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 例如，具有描述H263编解码器的<codec>元素的片段如下所示：

contents.text:
<codec name="video">
 <subtype>H263</subtype>
</codec>
A fragment where the <codec> element describes the H264 video codec with additional information about the profile level and packetization mode is as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: <codec>元素描述H264视频编解码器的片段，包括有关配置文件级别和打包模式的附加信息，如下所示：

contents.text:
<codec name="video">
 <subtype>H264</subtype>
 <params>
  <param name="profile-level-id">42A01E</param>
  <param name="packetization-mode">0</param>
 </params>
</codec>
4.5. <params>
contents.zh-CHS: 4.5. <params>

contents.text: The <params> element is a container for <param> elements (Section 4.5.1).
contents.zh-CHS: <params>元素是<param>元素的容器（第4.5.1节）。

contents.text: The <params> element has no attributes, but the following child elements are defined (zero or more):
contents.zh-CHS: <params>元素没有属性，但定义了以下子元素（零个或多个）：

contents.text: <param>: specifies a parameter name and value (Section 4.5.1).
contents.zh-CHS: <param>：指定参数名称和值（第4.5.1节）。

contents.text: The <param> element describes a parameter name and value.
contents.zh-CHS: <param>元素描述参数名称和值。

contents.text: The <param> element has the following attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: <param>元素具有以下属性：

contents.text: name: a string indicating the name of the parameter. The attribute is mandatory.
contents.zh-CHS: 名称：指示参数名称的字符串。该属性是必需的。

contents.text: type: specifies a type indicating how the in-line value of the parameter is to be interpreted. A valid value is a MIME media type (see Section 4.7.6). The attribute is optional. The default value is "text/plain".
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：指定一种类型，指示如何解释参数的内联值。有效值为MIME媒体类型（见第4.7.6节）。该属性是可选的。默认值为“文本/普通”。

contents.text: encoding: specifies a content-transfer-encoding schema applied to the in-line value of the parameter on top of the MIME media type specified with the 'type' attribute. A valid value is a content-transfer-encoding schema as defined by the "mechanism" token in Section 6.1 of [RFC2045]. The attribute is optional. There is no default value.
contents.zh-CHS: 编码：指定内容传输编码架构，该架构应用于使用“type”属性指定的MIME媒体类型顶部参数的内联值。有效值是[RFC2045]第6.1节中“机制”标记定义的内容传输编码模式。该属性是可选的。没有默认值。

contents.text: The <param> element content model is the value of the parameter. Note that a value that contains XML characters (e.g., "<") needs to be escaped following standard XML conventions.
contents.zh-CHS: <param>元素含量模型是参数的值。请注意，包含XML字符（例如“<”）的值需要按照标准XML约定进行转义。

contents.text: 4.6. Response Status Codes
contents.zh-CHS: 4.6. 响应状态代码

contents.text: This section describes the response codes in Table 1 for the 'status' attribute of mixer management <response> (Section 4.2.3) and <auditresponse> (Section 4.3.2). The MS MUST support the status response codes defined here. All other valid but undefined values are reserved for future use, where new status codes are assigned using the Standards Action process defined in [RFC5226]. The AS MUST treat any responses it does not recognize as being equivalent to the x00 response code for all classes. For example, if an AS receives an unrecognized response code of 499, it can safely assume that there was something wrong with its request and treat the response as if it had received a 400 (Syntax error) response code.
contents.zh-CHS: 本节描述了表1中混音器管理<response>（第4.2.3节）和<auditresponse>（第4.3.2节）的“状态”属性的响应代码。MS必须支持此处定义的状态响应代码。所有其他有效但未定义的值保留供将来使用，其中新的状态代码使用[RFC5226]中定义的标准操作流程分配。AS必须将其无法识别的任何响应视为等同于所有类的x00响应代码。例如，如果AS接收到无法识别的响应代码499，它可以安全地假设其请求有问题，并将响应视为收到400（语法错误）响应代码。

contents.text: 4xx responses are definite failure responses from a particular MS. The 'reason' attribute in the response SHOULD identify the failure in more detail, for example, "Mandatory attribute missing: id2 join element" for a 400 (Syntax error) response code.
contents.zh-CHS: 4xx响应是特定MS的明确故障响应。响应中的“原因”属性应更详细地标识故障，例如400（语法错误）响应代码的“强制性属性缺失：id2连接元素”。

contents.text: The AS SHOULD NOT retry the same request without modification (for example, correcting a syntax error or changing the conferenceid to use one available on the MS). However, the same request to a different MS might be successful, for example, if another MS supports a capability required in the request.
contents.zh-CHS: AS不应在未经修改的情况下重试同一请求（例如，更正语法错误或更改conferenceid以使用MS上可用的conferenceid）。但是，如果另一个MS支持请求中所需的功能，则对不同MS的相同请求可能会成功。

contents.text: 4xx failure responses can be grouped into three classes: failure due to a syntax error in the request (400); failure due to an error executing the request on the MS (405-419); and failure due to the request requiring a capability not supported by the MS (420-435).
contents.zh-CHS: 4xx故障响应可分为三类：由于请求中的语法错误导致的故障（400）；由于在MS上执行请求时出错而导致的故障（405-419）；以及由于请求需要MS不支持的功能而导致的故障（420-435）。

contents.text: In cases where more than one request code could be reported for a failure, the MS SHOULD use the most specific error code of the failure class for the detected error. For example, if the MS detects that the conference identifier in the request is invalid, then it uses a 406 status code. However, if the MS merely detects that an execution error occurred, then 419 is used.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果一个故障可以报告多个请求代码，则MS应针对检测到的错误使用故障类别中最具体的错误代码。例如，如果MS检测到请求中的会议标识符无效，则它使用406状态码。然而，如果MS仅仅检测到发生了执行错误，则使用419。

contents.text: 4.7. Type Definitions
contents.zh-CHS: 4.7. 类型定义

contents.text: This section defines types referenced in attribute definitions.
contents.zh-CHS: 本节定义属性定义中引用的类型。

contents.text: 4.7.1. Boolean

The value space of boolean is the set {true, false, 1, 0} as defined in Section 3.2.2 of [XMLSchema:Part2]. In accordance with this definition, the concept of false can be lexically represented by the strings "0" and "false" and the concept of true by the strings "1" and "true"; implementations MUST support both styles of lexical representation.
contents.zh-CHS: boolean的值空间是集合{true，false，1，0}，如[XMLSchema:Part2]第3.2.2节所定义。根据该定义，false的概念可以用字符串“0”和“false”在词汇上表示，true的概念可以用字符串“1”和“true”表示；实现必须支持两种类型的词汇表示。

contents.text: 4.7.2. Non-Negative Integer
contents.zh-CHS: 4.7.2. 非负整数

contents.text: The value space of non-negative integer is the infinite set {0,1,2,...} as defined in Section 3.3.20 of [XMLSchema:Part2].
contents.zh-CHS: 非负整数的值空间是[XMLSchema:Part2]第3.3.20节中定义的无限集{0,1,2，…}。

contents.text: 4.7.3. Positive Integer
The value space of positive integer is the infinite set {1,2,...} as defined in Section 3.3.25 of [XMLSchema:Part2].
contents.zh-CHS: 正整数的值空间是[XMLSchema:Part2]第3.3.25节中定义的无限集{1,2，…}。

contents.text: 4.7.4. String
A string in the character encoding associated with the XML element as defined in Section 3.2.1 of [XMLSchema:Part2].
contents.zh-CHS: 与[XMLSchema:Part2]第3.2.1节中定义的XML元素关联的字符编码中的字符串。

contents.text: 4.7.5. Time Designation
contents.zh-CHS: 4.7.5. 时间指定

contents.text: A time designation consists of a non-negative real number followed by a time unit identifier.
contents.zh-CHS: 时间指定由非负实数和时间单位标识符组成。

contents.text: The time unit identifiers are: "ms" (milliseconds) and "s" (seconds).
contents.zh-CHS: 时间单位标识符为：“ms”（毫秒）和“s”（秒）。

contents.text: Examples include: "3s", "850ms", "0.7s", ".5s" and "+1.5s".
4.7.6. MIME Media Type
contents.zh-CHS: 4.7.6. MIME媒体类型

contents.text: A string formatted as an IANA MIME media type [MIME.mediatypes]. The ABNF ([RFC5234]) production for the string is:
contents.zh-CHS: 格式为IANA MIME媒体类型[MIME.mediatypes]的字符串。字符串的ABNF（[RFC5234]）生产为：

contents.text: media-type = type-name "/" subtype-name *(";" parameter)
parameter = parameter-name "=" value
contents.zh-CHS: 参数=参数名称“=”值

contents.text: where "type-name" and "subtype-name" are defined in Section 4.2 of [RFC4288], "parameter-name" is defined in Section 4.3 of [RFC4288], and "value" is defined in Section 5.1 of [RFC2045].
contents.zh-CHS: 其中，[RFC4288]第4.2节定义了“类型名称”和“子类型名称”，[RFC4288]第4.3节定义了“参数名称”，而[RFC2045]第5.1节定义了“值”。

contents.text: 4.7.7. Language Identifier
contents.zh-CHS: 4.7.7. 语言标识符

contents.text: A language identifier labels information content as being of a particular human language variant. Following the XML specification for language identification [XML], a legal language identifier is identified by a [RFC5646] code and matched according to [RFC4647].
contents.zh-CHS: 语言标识符将信息内容标记为特定人类语言变体。根据语言标识[XML]的XML规范，合法语言标识符由[RFC5646]代码标识，并根据[RFC4647]进行匹配。

contents.text: 5. Formal Syntax
contents.zh-CHS: 5. 形式语法

contents.text: This section defines the XML schema for the Mixer Control Package. The schema is normative.
contents.zh-CHS: 本节定义混合器控制包的XML模式。该模式是规范性的。

contents.text: The schema defines datatypes, attributes, and mixer elements in the urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:msc-mixer namespace. In most elements, the order of child elements is significant. The schema is extensible: elements allow attributes and child elements from other namespaces.
contents.zh-CHS: 模式在urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:msc mixer名称空间中定义数据类型、属性和mixer元素。在大多数元素中，子元素的顺序很重要。模式是可扩展的：元素允许来自其他名称空间的属性和子元素。

contents.text: Elements from outside this package's namespace can occur after elements defined in this package.
contents.zh-CHS: 此包命名空间之外的元素可以出现在此包中定义的元素之后。

contents.text: The schema is dependent upon the schema (framework.xsd) defined in Appendix A.1 of the Control Framework [RFC6230].
contents.zh-CHS: 该模式依赖于控制框架[RFC6230]附录A.1中定义的模式（framework.xsd）。

contents.text:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<xsd:schema targetNamespace="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:msc-mixer"
 xmlns:fw="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:control:framework-attributes"
 elementFormDefault="qualified"
 xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"
 xmlns="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:msc-mixer"
 xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">

<xsd:annotation>
 <xsd:documentation>
  IETF MediaCtrl Mixer 1.0 (20110104)
This is the schema of the Mixer Control Package. It defines request, response, and notification elements for mixing.
contents.zh-CHS: 这是混合器控制包的模式。它定义了用于混合的请求、响应和通知元素。

contents.text: The schema namespace is urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:msc-mixer

</xsd:documentation>
</xsd:annotation>
SCHEMA IMPORTS
contents.zh-CHS: 模式导入

contents.text:
<xsd:import
 namespace="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:control:framework-attributes"
 schemaLocation="framework.xsd">
 <xsd:annotation>
  <xsd:documentation>
   This import brings in the framework attributes for
   conferenceid and connectionid.
  </xsd:documentation>
 </xsd:annotation>
</xsd:import>
Extensible core type
contents.zh-CHS: 可扩展核心类型

contents.text:
<xsd:complexType name="Tcore">
 <xsd:annotation>
  <xsd:documentation>
   This type is extended by other (non-mixed) component types to
   allow attributes from other namespaces.
  </xsd:documentation>
 </xsd:annotation>
 <xsd:sequence/>
 <xsd:anyAttribute namespace="##other" processContents="lax" />
</xsd:complexType>
TOP-LEVEL ELEMENT: mscmixer
contents.zh-CHS: 顶级元素：mscmixer

contents.text:
<xsd:complexType name="mscmixerType">
 <xsd:complexContent>
  <xsd:extension base="Tcore">
   <xsd:sequence>
    <xsd:choice>
     <xsd:element ref="createconference" />
     <xsd:element ref="modifyconference" />
     <xsd:element ref="destroyconference" />
     <xsd:element ref="join" />
     <xsd:element ref="unjoin" />
     <xsd:element ref="modifyjoin" />
     <xsd:element ref="response" />
     <xsd:element ref="event" />
     <xsd:element ref="audit" />
     <xsd:element ref="auditresponse" />
     <xsd:any namespace="##other" minOccurs="0"
      maxOccurs="unbounded" processContents="lax" />
    </xsd:choice>
   </xsd:sequence>
   <xsd:attribute name="version" type="version.datatype"
    use="required" />

<xsd:attribute name="desclang" type="xsd:language"
    default="i-default" />
  </xsd:extension>
 </xsd:complexContent>
</xsd:complexType>
<xsd:element name="mscmixer" type="mscmixerType" />
CONFERENCE MANAGEMENT TYPES
contents.zh-CHS: 会议管理类型

contents.text: <!--  createconference -->

<xsd:complexType name="createconferenceType">
 <xsd:complexContent>
  <xsd:extension base="Tcore">
   <xsd:sequence>
    <xsd:element ref="codecs" minOccurs="0"
     maxOccurs="1" />
    <xsd:element ref="audio-mixing" minOccurs="0"
     maxOccurs="1" />
    <xsd:element ref="video-layouts" minOccurs="0"
     maxOccurs="1" />
    <xsd:element ref="video-switch" minOccurs="0"
     maxOccurs="1" />
    <xsd:element ref="subscribe" minOccurs="0"
     maxOccurs="1" />
    <xsd:any namespace="##other"
     processContents="lax" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded" />
   </xsd:sequence>
   <xsd:attribute name="conferenceid" type="xsd:string" />
   <xsd:attribute name="reserved-talkers"
    type="xsd:nonNegativeInteger" default="0" />
   <xsd:attribute name="reserved-listeners"
    type="xsd:nonNegativeInteger" default="0" />
  </xsd:extension>
 </xsd:complexContent>
</xsd:complexType>
<xsd:element name="createconference" type="createconferenceType" />
<!--  modifyconference -->

<xsd:complexType name="modifyconferenceType">
 <xsd:complexContent>
  <xsd:extension base="Tcore">
   <xsd:sequence>
    <xsd:element ref="codecs" minOccurs="0"
     maxOccurs="1" />
    <xsd:element ref="audio-mixing" minOccurs="0"
     maxOccurs="1" />
    <xsd:element ref="video-layouts" minOccurs="0"
     maxOccurs="1" />
    <xsd:element ref="video-switch" minOccurs="0"
     maxOccurs="1" />
    <xsd:element ref="subscribe" />
    <xsd:any namespace="##other"
     processContents="lax" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded" />
   </xsd:sequence>
   <xsd:attribute name="conferenceid" type="xsd:string"
    use="required" />
  </xsd:extension>
 </xsd:complexContent>
</xsd:complexType>
<xsd:element name="modifyconference" type="modifyconferenceType" />
<!--  destroyconference -->

<xsd:complexType name="destroyconferenceType">
<xsd:complexContent>
  <xsd:extension base="Tcore">
  <xsd:sequence>
   <xsd:any namespace="##other" minOccurs="0"
     maxOccurs="unbounded" processContents="lax" />
   </xsd:sequence>
  <xsd:attribute name="conferenceid" type="xsd:string"
  use="required" />
  </xsd:extension>
  </xsd:complexContent>
</xsd:complexType>

<xsd:element name="destroyconference"
 type="destroyconferenceType" />
JOIN TYPES
contents.zh-CHS: 连接类型

contents.text:

 <xsd:complexContent>
  <xsd:extension base="Tcore">
   <xsd:sequence>
    <xsd:element ref="stream" minOccurs="0"
     maxOccurs="unbounded" />
    <xsd:any namespace="##other"
     processContents="lax" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded" />
   </xsd:sequence>
   <xsd:attribute name="id1" type="xsd:string"
    use="required" />
   <xsd:attribute name="id2" type="xsd:string"
    use="required" />

 </xsd:complexContent>
</xsd:complexType>
<xsd:element name="join" type="joinType" />

<xsd:complexType name="modifyjoinType">

  <xsd:extension base="Tcore">
   <xsd:sequence>
    <xsd:element ref="stream" minOccurs="0"

    <xsd:any namespace="##other"
     processContents="lax" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded" />
   </xsd:sequence>

    use="required" />

 </xsd:complexContent>
</xsd:complexType>

<xsd:any namespace="##other"
